message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm initially offering it at $15,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is quite a bit below its true value. To move this forward, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I still feel that $8,000 would be a fair price for me. I would like to stick to my original offer of $8,000.
